name: Alien Doods
description:
STORY:

Alien doods or doods are some of the rarest alien creatures on planet Rose!
Using your trusty laser gun, defeat the hostile creatures of the planet, and find and collect three alien doods to power and strengthen the satellite's signal in hopes of requesting help to escape the planet.

GAME JAM:

Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

TEAM:

starshums • tintrash • philipe go • vanillaspace

#BrackeysGameJam
